english_example_sentence: The small child never agrees with his/her mother on this matter.
russian_example_sentence: Маленький ребенок никогда не соглашается со своей матерью по этому вопросу.
turkish_example_sentence: Küçük çocuk, annesiyle bu konuda asla anlaşmaz.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Küçük çocuk, annesiyle bu konuda asla ______.
